Breakfast: 7:30 a.m. to 8:30 a.m.
Lunch: 11:45 a.m. to 12:45 p.m.

Lunch 11:45 AM – 12:45 AM

properties.offering: Free breakfast and lunch meals will be provided to all DPS enrolled students, regardless of school. No paperwork required, but children must be present and meals will be distributed based on number of children present. Breakfast and lunch will be provided together via drive-thru pickups. No eating of meals on-site.
properties.notes: Families will be able to pick up both breakfast & lunch at the same timeo on the following dates Mon, March 23 – Fri, April 3, 2020 at 4 school sites from 10:30 a.m.-11:30 a.m.
